GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange Active Sync), OneNote, Microsoft Outlook, Excel, Word, Power Point
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Speed Dialing, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Nokia Stereo Headset WH-108, User Guide, Battery, Handset, Charger

Camera.Other Camera Features: Sensor Size: 1/5-inch, Fixed Focus, f-number/aperture: f/2.8, Focal Length: 36 mm, Lumia Camera, Lumia Selfie

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports GSM FR, AAC-LC, AMR-NB
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports H.264, H.263, MPEG4, Windows Video, VC-1, MP4, AVC

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (HFP 1.6, OPP 1.1, AVRCP 1.4, PBAP 1.1, GATT, A2DP 1.2)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, GLONASS, with HERE Maps, Bing Maps, HERE Drive+

Other Features.Important Apps: MixRadio, Skype Video Call, Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, WhatsApp, Foursquare, OneDrive, YouTube, Touch UI, DirectX 11, Lync (Corporate IM) Free Download, Company Hub for Enterprise Applications, Nokia Photo Transfer for Mac
Other Features.Sensors: Proximity Sensor, Orientation Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer

Display.Other Display Features: Brightness Control, Easy to Clean, RGB Stripe, Tactile Feedback, Color Boosting, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, Multipoint-touch

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
